name: AP_CLAIM_IF_MED_VIS_DXSSF
description: This table extracts data received from PPS pricer for a claim in GOB2.APG 'Medical Visit Diagnosis/SSF'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MEDICAL_VISIT_DX_SSF
columns.description: Identifies the diagnosis used to assign a Medical APG or Signs Symptoms and Findings (SSF) APG. This field is populated only when a Medical Visit APG or SSF APG is assigned to this service date and is applicable to this visit.
